data.message: Uhh lol Eminem would have eated whole voice of drake and maybe didnt let him even sing for 2 minutes ...I like eminem not because he is on the top but because nobody got that much stamina like him really Marshall when you raps you sound like you are shouting out your hurts which gives us inspiration like a magic and you doesnt need any background music to be played while you Raps Live in any concert and You are my inspirational idol Love you my master marshall forever and ever :') #MMLP
